TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BufferedGraphics extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class BufferedGraphics Implements IDisposable
public ref class BufferedGraphics sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供雙重緩衝的圖形緩衝區。

span.span: Provides a graphics buffer for double buffering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您實作自訂雙重緩衝的圖形。The class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics. 它提供圖形緩衝區，以及可用來寫入緩衝區以及轉譯其內容至輸出裝置的方法包裝函式。It provides a wrapper for a graphics buffer, along with methods that you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device. 使用雙重緩衝的圖形可以減少或消除閃爍因重繪顯示介面的。Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface. 當您使用雙重緩衝時，緩衝區在記憶體中，會先繪製更新的圖形和這個緩衝區的內容會接著快速寫入部分或所有顯示的介面。When you use double buffering, updated graphics are first drawn to a buffer in memory, and the contents of this buffer are then quickly written to some or all of the displayed surface. 顯示圖形這相當簡短覆寫通常會減少，或完全排除，有時會發生更新時，圖形會閃爍。This relatively brief overwrite of the displayed graphics typically reduces or eliminates the flicker that sometimes occurs when graphics are updated. > [!NOTE] > 使用雙重緩衝的最簡單方式是設定控制樣式旗標控制使用方法。The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the control style flag on a control using the method. 設定旗標的控制項將所有繪製控制項的預設圖形緩衝區中，透過重新都導向而不需要任何額外的程式碼。Setting the flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code. 若要設定此旗標`true`預設。This flag is set to `true` by default. 類別沒有公用建構函式，而且必須先建立應用程式網域使用其方法。The class has no public constructor and must be created by the for an application domain using its method. 您可以擷取目前應用程式定義域靜態屬性。You can retrieve the for the current application domain from the static property. 屬性可用於繪圖至圖形緩衝區。The property can be used for drawing to the graphics buffer. 此屬性可存取繪製至這個已配置的圖形緩衝區的物件物件。This property provides access to the object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this object. 與任何引數繪製的圖形內容的緩衝區至介面方法可讓您指定當已配置的緩衝區。The method with no arguments draws the contents of the graphics buffer to the surface specified when the buffer was allocated. 其他多載方法可讓您指定物件或指向要繪製圖形緩衝區的內容的裝置內容物件。Other overloads of the method allow you to specify a object or an object that points to a device context to which to draw the contents of the graphics buffer. 如需繪製雙重緩衝的圖形的詳細資訊，請參閱[雙重緩衝的圖形](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md)。For more information about drawing double-buffered graphics, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用繪製圖形使用緩衝實作的幾種類型的物件。The following code example demonstrates using a object to draw graphics using several types of buffering implementations. 按一下表單，或者啟動然後停止計時器，導致繪製更新。Clicking the form alternately starts and stops a timer that causes draw updates. 繪製更新可讓您觀察雙重緩衝的效果。The draw updates allow you to observe the effect of double buffering. 以滑鼠右鍵按一下下列的繪圖模式中表單的迴圈：Right-clicking the form cycles through the following drawing modes: - 直接繪圖如。Drawing directly to the for a . - 藉由覆寫繪製方法使用控制樣式。Drawing by overriding the method using the control style. - 藉由覆寫繪製表單方法，而不需要使用方法控制樣式。Drawing by overriding the method for the form method without using the control style. 在每個模式中，會繪製文字，以識別目前的模式，並描述每個已按下滑鼠按鈕時所發生的行為。In each mode, text is drawn that identifies the current mode and describes the behavior that occurs when each mouse button is pressed. [!code-cpp[BufferedGraphicsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferedGraphicsExample/CPP/bufferingtest.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BufferedGraphicsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferedGraphicsExample/CS/bufferingtest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BufferedGraphicsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferedGraphicsExample/VB/bufferingtest.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 類別不具備執行緒安全。

span.span: The class is not thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 當存取圖形緩衝區從不同的執行緒，請務必使用執行緒存取控制機制，以避免衝突。

span.span: When accessing a graphics buffer from separate threads, it is important to use a thread-access control mechanism to prevent conflicts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放由 物件使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫完畢時使用物件。Call when you are finished using the object. 方法會使中無法使用的狀態物件。The method leaves the object in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考物件，以便記憶體回收行程可以回收的記憶體，物件所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the object so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the object was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 請務必呼叫您釋放最後一個參考之前物件。Always call before you release your last reference to the object. 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性提供繪製至這個已配置的圖形緩衝區的物件物件。This property provides a object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this object.

span.span: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the default device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會寫入圖形緩衝區的內容，藉由呼叫指定的裝置方法用來建立此物件。This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device specified by calling the method of the used to create this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將圖形緩衝區的內容寫入指定物件。This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the specified object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呈現圖形緩衝區的內容與指定物件。The following code example demonstrates rendering the contents of the graphics buffer to a specified object. 這段程式碼是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將圖形緩衝區的內容寫入指定相關聯的裝置內容處理。This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device context associated with the specified handle. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呈現圖形緩衝區的內容`grafx`指定的裝置內容。The following code example demonstrates how to render the contents of the graphics buffer `grafx` to a specified device context. 這段程式碼是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class.
